snippet.title: ピンクパンサー Pink Panther Pinkadelic Pursuit 1/6
snippet.description:
Pink Panter : Pinkadelic Pursuit.

Let's follow The Pink Panther in a wonderful adventure.
After dying his uncle, The Pink Panther inherits his uncle's house and fortune but in order to get it, he must get nine keys to open the attic. Those keys are hidden in different rooms from his uncle's house, but these rooms seem to be a portal to another dimension. 

The Pink Panther will travel to different places and experiment all his uncle's adventures.
Will The Pink Panther get all the keys?
If you want to know what will happen, join me and The Pink Panther in this adventure!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The Pink Panter was created by Blake Edwards

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Game details
Developer: Etranges Libellules
Publisher: Wanadoo Edition
Platform: PlayStation

#ps1 #psx #ピンクパンサー #pinkpanther #pinkadelicpursuit
